item.title: How do you add login notifications?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:552857”]Assuming you’re using PI, at the end of your player initialization method (I think “initialize” in the client class)

if (c.playerRights == 3) {
  for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
    ((Client)p).sendMessage("Admin " + c.playerName + " has logged in.");
  }
}

For a new player it would be a little more complicated.
Easiest way would probably by checking if the player has a save file already on login,
and if he hasn’t you can set a flag to indicate that it’s a new player and do similar as with staff in his initialization.[/quote]
